metadata.description: This generative art project takes the color gradient from artworks of eight incredible artists and combines them through a series of interleaving concentric triangles. It is an homage to these artists and an appreciation of each of their distinctive styles. The artists featured in this project are Shinique Smith, Shara Hughes, Katie Stout, Wangechi Mutu, Pia Camil, Zakk Lyth, Cynthia Daignault, and Rachel Rossin.
metadata.name: triangles #1
